errors.error_description: The URL provided for manual installation in the Kodi file manager points to a sub-directory (`/kodi19/`) instead of the root of the repository, which will prevent Kodi from finding the repository files.
correction_candidates: The correct URL for the Kodi file manager is `https://castagnait.github.io/repository.castagnait/`.
errors.golden_answer: The correct URL for the Kodi file manager is `https://castagnait.github.io/repository.castagnait/`.
